:hljs.description: If you want to set 'hljs' locally, you can pass this property to the component
:hljs.description_zh: 如果你想局部设定 `hljs` ，可以通过这个属性传给组件

language.description: The language in which the logs are in 'highlightjs'

:lines.description: Displays the log content by row, which is invalid when the 'log' parameter is also present
:lines.description_zh: 按行显示日志内容，在同时存在 `log` 参数时，该参数无效

loading.description: Whether or not it is loading

trim.description: Whether or not to display the log after 'trim'
trim.description_zh: 是否显示 `trim` 后的日志

events.name: require-more
events.description: Callback function for rolling load logs
events.description_zh: 滚动加载日志的回调函数

events.name: reach-top
events.description: Scroll to the callback function at the top
events.description_zh: 滚动到顶部的回调函数

events.name: reach-bottom
events.description: Scroll to the callback function at the bottom
events.description_zh: 滚动到底部的回调函数
